official_title: Paying tribute to the Visiting Nurse Association of Central Jersey on the occasion of the association's 90th anniversary, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Pays tribute, on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of the Visiting Nurse Association of Central Jersey, to the association, to Judith Stanley Coleman for her 25 years of dedicated service as chair of the association, to its 1,000 employees for their caring, expertise, and loyalty, and to its many dedicated volunteers for the precious gift of their time.

titles.title: Paying tribute to the Visiting Nurse Association of Central Jersey on the occasion of the association's 90th anniversary, and for other purposes.
